summary: Riddle/riddle-game app where users can generate riddles and answers, with an option to add their own riddle.
known_issues: Generated answer currently repeats the question instead of producing a distinct answer.

existing_features.title: Fix the answer-generation flow so the returned/generated answer text is not simply the same text the user entered as the riddle/question.
Make providing a custom riddle optional: allow generating an answer even if the user does not enter any riddle text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix issue where the generated answer is just repeating the question instead of providing an actual answer.
Make adding your own riddle optional (allow users to skip providing a custom riddle).
Update the backend generateAnswer API behavior to treat the provided text parameter as optional riddle input and generate a non-empty answer even when that text is empty.
